Question: Do you want to create an Onlineshop?
Which payment methods should be supported?
Should a search function be suppoted?
Constraint/Rule: if (!Search)  { Sort = true; } if (Search) { UserManagement = Security; }

Question: Which user management enhancements should be supported?
Constraint/Rule: if (!UserManagement.Security) { allow(UserManagement.Payments); } if (UserManagement.Security) { disAllow(UserManagement.Payments); } if (!UserManagement.Payments) { allow(UserManagement.Security); } if (UserManagement.Payments) { disAllow(UserManagement.Security); }
